title: Store RP bug
body: I cant buy RP, whenever i try to the screen is all white and the payment options arent selectable.  They appear on there but cannot be selected nor can i proceed any further

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can review this issue and find some options.  Our billing team will respond to your ticket asap!
